name: CUSTOM Testimonials #20
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile    
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign slide_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_padding_vertical
  assign slide_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_radius = section.settings.slide_radius  
  assign slide_border_thickness = section.settings.slide_border_thickness
  assign slide_border_color = section.settings.slide_border_color
  assign slide_bg_color = section.settings.slide_bg_color
  assign slide_shadow = section.settings.slide_shadow
  assign slide_shadow_color = section.settings.slide_shadow_color
  assign slide_content_align = section.settings.slide_content_align
  assign slide_content_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_align_mobile

  assign slide_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if slide_content_align == "center"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif slide_content_align == "right"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if slide_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif slide_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign author_wrapper_gap = section.settings.author_wrapper_gap
  assign author_wrapper_gap_mobile = section.settings.author_wrapper_gap_mobile

  assign author_image_width = section.settings.author_image_width
  assign author_image_width_mobile = section.settings.author_image_width_mobile
  assign author_image_radius = section.settings.author_image_radius

  assign author_custom = section.settings.author_custom
  assign author_font = section.settings.author_font
  assign author_size = section.settings.author_size
  assign author_size_mobile = section.settings.author_size_mobile
  assign author_height = section.settings.author_height
  assign author_color = section.settings.author_color

  assign author_time_custom = section.settings.author_time_custom
  assign author_time_font = section.settings.author_time_font
  assign author_time_size = section.settings.author_time_size
  assign author_time_size_mobile = section.settings.author_time_size_mobile
  assign author_time_height = section.settings.author_time_height
  assign author_time_color = section.settings.author_time_color
  assign author_time_mt = section.settings.author_time_mt
  assign author_time_mt_mobile = section.settings.author_time_mt_mobile
  
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_mt = section.settings.image_mt
  assign image_mt_mobile = section.settings.image_mt_mobile
  assign image_full_width = section.settings.image_full_width

  assign comment_custom = section.settings.comment_custom
  assign comment_font = section.settings.comment_font
  assign comment_size = section.settings.comment_size
  assign comment_size_mobile = section.settings.comment_size_mobile
  assign comment_height = section.settings.comment_height
  assign comment_color = section.settings.comment_color
  assign comment_mt = section.settings.comment_mt
  assign comment_mt_mobile = section.settings.comment_mt_mobile

  assign comments_icon_size = section.settings.comments_icon_size
  assign comments_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.comments_icon_size_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign dots_size = section.settings.dots_size
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_desktop = section.settings.dots_show_desktop
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color
  assign dots_mt = section.settings.dots_mt
  assign dots_mt_mobile = section.settings.dots_mt_mobile

  assign buttons_border_thickness = section.settings.buttons_border_thickness
  assign buttons_border_color = section.settings.buttons_border_color
  assign buttons_mt = section.settings.buttons_mt
  assign buttons_mt_mobile = section.settings.buttons_mt_mobile

  assign button_icon_size = section.settings.button_icon_size
  assign button_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.button_icon_size_mobile
  assign button_icon_color = section.settings.button_icon_color

  assign button_text_custom = section.settings.button_text_custom
  assign button_text_font = section.settings.button_text_font
  assign button_text_size = section.settings.button_text_size
  assign button_text_size_mobile = section.settings.button_text_size_mobile
  assign button_text_height = section.settings.button_text_height
  assign button_text_color = section.settings.button_text_color
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ author_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ author_time_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ comment_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ button_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 15px;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 1 0 !important;
    padding: 20px 0px !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
    border: {{ slide_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ slide_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ slide_bg_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ slide_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: {{ author_wrapper_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ author_image_width_mobile }}px;    
    border-radius: {{ author_image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    aspect-ratio: 1/1;
  }
  
  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }} {    
    margin: 0;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: {{ author_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ author_color }};
    line-height: {{ author_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .testimonials-author-time-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ author_time_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ author_time_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ author_time_color }};
    line-height: {{ author_time_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: {{ image_mt_mobile }}px;
    margin-left: 0px;
    margin-right: 0px;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-comments-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-top: {{ comment_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-count-comments-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;    
  }

  .testimonials-count-comments-icons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center; 
  }

  .testimonials-count-comments-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ comments_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ comments_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-count-comments-icon-{{ section.id }} img,
  .testimonials-count-comments-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-count-comment-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ comment_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ comment_color }};
    line-height: {{ comment_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-comment-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ comment_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ comment_color }};
    line-height: {{ comment_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static !important;
    margin: 0px auto !important;
    margin-top: {{ dots_mt_mobile }}px !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    max-width: fit-content;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    border: 0px !important;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }} !important;
    opacity: 0.4 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    transform: scale(1.3) !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 10px;
    border-top: {{ buttons_border_thickness }}px solid {{ buttons_border_color }};
    margin-top: {{ buttons_mt_mobile }}px;
    padding-top: 10px;
  }

  .testimonials-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .testimonials-button-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ button_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ button_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }
  
  .testimonials-button-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ button_icon_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-button-icon-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .testimonials-button-icon-{{ section.id }} img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-button-text-{{ section.id }} {    
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ button_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }    

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }
  
    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-slider-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: -0rem !important;
      margin-right: -0rem !important;
      padding-left: 20px !important;
      padding-right:  20px !important;
    }

    .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }

    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ slide_content_horizontal_align }};
      gap: {{ author_wrapper_gap }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ author_image_width }}px;    
    }

    .testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ author_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }

    .testimonials-author-time-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ author_time_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ author_time_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }

    .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_content_align }};
    }

    .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ image_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-comments-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ comment_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-count-comment-{{ section.id }} {      
      font-size: {{ comment_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-comment-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ comment_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-count-comments-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ comments_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ comments_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ dots_mt }}px !important;
    }
    
    .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
    }

    .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ buttons_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-button-text-{{ section.id }} {  
      font-size: {{ button_text_size }}px;
    }    

    .testimonials-button-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ button_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ button_icon_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if author_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ author_font.family }}, {{ author_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ author_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ author_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if author_time_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-time-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ author_time_font.family }}, {{ author_time_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ author_time_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ author_time_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if comment_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-comment-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ comment_font.family }}, {{ comment_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ comment_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ comment_font.style }};
    }

    .testimonials-count-comment-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ comment_font.family }}, {{ comment_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ comment_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ comment_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-button-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_text_font.family }}, {{  button_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{  button_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_content_align_mobile == "center" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_content_align_mobile == "right" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: row-reverse;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_content_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: column;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif slide_content_align == "right" %}
 <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
 <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_full_width %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
      width: auto;
      margin-left: -{{ slide_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
      margin-right: -{{ slide_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    }
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-image-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: -{{ slide_padding_horizontal }}px;
        margin-right: -{{ slide_padding_horizontal }}px;
      }
    }

  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_shadow %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px {{ slide_shadow_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.149 }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 15px;    
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap | plus: 15 }}px;
    } 

    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} testimonials-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }}"> {{ heading }}</div> 
      {% endif %}      
      <div class="testimonials-slider-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <button class="testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              <div class="testimonials-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="testimonials-author-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="testimonials-author-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.author_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.author_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.author_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                 
                    {% else %}    
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <div class="testimonials-author-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.author != blank %}
                      <p class="testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.author }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.time %}
                      <p class="testimonials-author-time-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.time }}</p>
                    {% endif %}                  
                  </div>
                </div>
                {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                  <div class="testimonials-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  <div class="testimonials-image-{{ section.id }}">                 
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                    
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
                <div class="testimonials-comments-{{ section.id }}">                  
                  {% if block.settings.count_comments != blank %}
                    <div class="testimonials-count-comments-{{ section.id }}">
                      <div class="testimonials-count-comments-icons-{{ section.id }}">

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initTestimonials20() {
    document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper(".testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.testimonials-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        type: "bullets",
        clickable: true
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }},
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }},
        }
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initTestimonials20);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initTestimonials20);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initTestimonials20);
  }
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
